export const projectsData = [{
  id: 1,
  title: "Personal Portfolio",
  description: "This website showcases my work and skills as a Web Designer and Developer. Designed and developed by me, it reflects my passion for creating impactful and user-friendly digital experiences!",
  technologies: ["React", "GitHub"],
  image: "/assets/images/project1.png",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://yverma7199.github.io/portfolio.yv/"
}, {
  id: 2,
  title: "SunnyMood Collection",
  description: "A responsive React + Tailwind CSS frontend showcasing summer fashion with cart functionality and dark mode. Features product filtering, dynamic cart management, and theme toggling using Context API.",
  technologies: ["React", "GitHub"],
  image: "/assets/images/project2.png",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://yverma7199.github.io/SunnyMood.github.io/#/"
}, {
  id: 3,
  title: "OLX-Sell-Clone-Page",
  description: "Developed an OLX-inspired property listing platform using React, featuring conditional form fields, 20-image uploads, and real-time validation with Tailwind CSS styling.",
  technologies: ["React", "Vercel", "Material UI"],
  image: "/assets/images/project3.png",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://olx-clone-new-weld.vercel.app/"
}, {
  id: 4,
  title: "Email Automation System",
  description: "Developed a comprehensive automation system using GAS with Gmail and Sheets integration. Features include campaign scheduling, contact management, analytics dashboard, and responsive UI for streamlined email marketing.",
  technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
  image: "/assets/images/project4.jpg",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hCsd1o1W5Gnulha9XTyzMPk7xrDMakctIb8k-xvEGuQ/edit?gid=0#gid=0"
}, {
  id: 5,
  title: "Challenge Review System",
  description: "You have to create two different challenge review systems, where users upload challenges and another person reviews them, marking them according to their suggestions and providing feedback.",
  technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
  image: "/assets/images/project5.jpg",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_QeTEmb-E9Uxh_Ndiq0EEhEM9yi2Ox8yXxPvGCf6basEgtRA7xZR7WNV-esAP1S9jQ/exec"
}, {
  id: 6,
  title: "HRMS System",
  description: "Developed a full-stack HR Management System using Google Apps Script and Google Sheets featuring attendance tracking, team/project management, and a challenges/review system with session-based authentication.",
  technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
  image: "/assets/images/project6.jpg",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: null
}, {
  id: 7,
  title: "Bakery Website",
  description: "Crafted with love and passion, this site showcases our delicious range of freshly baked goods. From artisan breads to mouth-watering pastries, we take pride in delivering quality, homemade treats!",
  technologies: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"],
  image: "/assets/images/project7.png",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: "https://www.magnoliabakery.com/"
}, {
  id: 8,
  title: "ASAP ( Automatic Smart Attendance System )",
  description: "Automatic Smart Attendance Project is a computer Vision + Flask system that marks attendance via face detection, syncs to Sheets, and notifies via SMS/Telegram using ESP32-CAM.",
  technologies: ["Arduino", "Python"],
  image: "/assets/images/project8.jpg",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: null
}, {
  id: 9,
  title: "DriveIT",
  description: "DriveIT is a device in which we can control the speed the vehicle and the direction of the vehicle using Mobile Phones.",
  technologies: ["Arduino", "Python"],
  image: "/assets/images/project9.jpg",
  githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
  liveDemo: null
}];

sourcesContent:
export const projectsData = [
    {
        id: 1,
        title: "Personal Portfolio",
        description: "This website showcases my work and skills as a Web Designer and Developer. Designed and developed by me, it reflects my passion for creating impactful and user-friendly digital experiences!",
        technologies: ["React", "GitHub"],
        image: "/assets/images/project1.png",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://yverma7199.github.io/portfolio.yv/"
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        title: "SunnyMood Collection",
        description: "A responsive React + Tailwind CSS frontend showcasing summer fashion with cart functionality and dark mode. Features product filtering, dynamic cart management, and theme toggling using Context API.",
        technologies: ["React", "GitHub"],
        image: "/assets/images/project2.png",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://yverma7199.github.io/SunnyMood.github.io/#/"
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        title: "OLX-Sell-Clone-Page",
        description: "Developed an OLX-inspired property listing platform using React, featuring conditional form fields, 20-image uploads, and real-time validation with Tailwind CSS styling.",
        technologies: ["React", "Vercel", "Material UI"],
        image: "/assets/images/project3.png",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://olx-clone-new-weld.vercel.app/"
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        title: "Email Automation System",
        description: "Developed a comprehensive automation system using GAS with Gmail and Sheets integration. Features include campaign scheduling, contact management, analytics dashboard, and responsive UI for streamlined email marketing.",
        technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
        image: "/assets/images/project4.jpg",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hCsd1o1W5Gnulha9XTyzMPk7xrDMakctIb8k-xvEGuQ/edit?gid=0#gid=0"
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        title: "Challenge Review System",
        description: "You have to create two different challenge review systems, where users upload challenges and another person reviews them, marking them according to their suggestions and providing feedback.",
        technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
        image: "/assets/images/project5.jpg",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_QeTEmb-E9Uxh_Ndiq0EEhEM9yi2Ox8yXxPvGCf6basEgtRA7xZR7WNV-esAP1S9jQ/exec"
    },
    {
        id: 6,
        title: "HRMS System",
        description: "Developed a full-stack HR Management System using Google Apps Script and Google Sheets featuring attendance tracking, team/project management, and a challenges/review system with session-based authentication.",
        technologies: ["Google Apps Script", "API"],
        image: "/assets/images/project6.jpg",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: null
    },
    {
        id: 7,
        title: "Bakery Website",
        description: "Crafted with love and passion, this site showcases our delicious range of freshly baked goods. From artisan breads to mouth-watering pastries, we take pride in delivering quality, homemade treats!",
        technologies: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"],
        image: "/assets/images/project7.png",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: "https://www.magnoliabakery.com/"
    },
    {
        id: 8,
        title: "ASAP ( Automatic Smart Attendance System )",
        description: "Automatic Smart Attendance Project is a computer Vision + Flask system that marks attendance via face detection, syncs to Sheets, and notifies via SMS/Telegram using ESP32-CAM.",
        technologies: ["Arduino", "Python"],
        image: "/assets/images/project8.jpg",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: null
    },
    {
        id: 9,
        title: "DriveIT",
        description: "DriveIT is a device in which we can control the speed the vehicle and the direction of the vehicle using Mobile Phones.",
        technologies: ["Arduino", "Python"],
        image: "/assets/images/project9.jpg",
        githubLink: "https://github.com/yverma7199",
        liveDemo: null
    },
  ];
